name: Bokosan - a reverse sokoban
description:
A reverse Sokoban game

This is your first night shift as a warehouse keeper.

Your job is to pull back all the boxes that were restlessly pushed in the wrong places by your daytime colleagues in the past 30 years.

Your boss said something about unusual rooms but that does not matter. Probably.

- Latest full version -

Play now or browse the full source code

- js13kGames version -

Play now on official site or mirrored page or browse the full source code

- moar stuff -

Created a little tracker frontend, you can now check the music separately and also see some internal stuffs of our music tracker.

The game has a dedicated domain as it stores highscores and stats on a server, please click the "Start the game" button above.
